word_mean: 多道程序设计(技术，方法)，多道程序[MP]

sentence.Network_en: An executive program that controls the activities of independent programs in a multiprogramming or time - shared system .
sentence.Network_cn: 在多道程序或 分时系统 中控制独立程序的活动的一种执行程序.

sentence.Network_en: In multiprogramming, the conditions under which low - priority programs are executed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在多道程序设计(系统或环境)中,特指(计算机运行的一些)状态, 在这种状态下,只执行优先级(较)低的程序.

sentence.Network_en: In multiprogramming, the environment in which high priority programs are executed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在多道程序设计中, 执行高优先级程序的环境.
